summary: Completed comprehensive mobile responsiveness testing for football prediction app. Mobile and desktop layouts working correctly with proper responsive behavior.
passed_tests: Mobile (400px): Header elements all visible - logo, search, theme toggle, login, register, hamburger
Mobile (400px): Tabs section has horizontal scroll capability
Mobile (400px): League filters have horizontal scroll capability
Mobile (400px): Match cards fit properly within viewport (376px cards in 400px width)
Mobile (400px): Vote buttons (1, X, 2) visible in all 113 match cards
Mobile (400px): Action buttons (Closed/GuessIt, Advance, Remove) visible and properly positioned
Mobile (400px): Team names and scores display correctly
Mobile (400px): Footer stats display without overflow
Desktop (1920px): 2-column grid layout preserved and working
Desktop (1920px): All header elements visible and properly sized
Desktop (1920px): Vote buttons and action buttons display in same row (not stacked)
Backend /api/football/matches returns matches with real data (113 matches)
Theme toggle works on both mobile and desktop
Horizontal scrolling implemented for tabs and league filters
Match cards responsive layout with proper button stacking on mobile
success_percentage: Backend: 77% (17/22 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (16/16 tests passed)
